name: Girl's Lovecast
description:
Summary

Girl's Lovecast is an action-adventure RPG in which girls try their best and defeat darkness. You explore dungeons to fight demons, and you explore hub areas, talking to people to gather clues and complete sidequests.

Disclaimers
  • Press the 'N' key at any time during the first level to skip to the next level (temporary dev tool, in case you don't have a save file from last time or don't wanna try any of the changes in the prologue)
  • Read the devlog to see what's changed
  • In the new scenario, the overworld city is pretty empty right now and the game just ends when you try going to school lol
